content: I am looking into providing translations of display values for existing code systems. For R4, I understand this works (AFAIK) by creating a CodeSystem with content = "supplement" and pointing to the underlying CodeSystem in supplements. However, I could not see how this would work (if at all) in STU3. The corresponding content code and the supplements field are missing, and I did not spot a suitable extension (nor is there any mapping of supplements in the R4 -> STU3 maps). Did I miss something?
you can use a cross version extension, though supplements don't generally work yet anyway

a CodeSystem supplement is the correct approach but I'm sure that Graham is correct that it's not implemented much yet. @Rob Hausam @Peter Jordan @Ted Klein Have we included supplements anywhere yet? Seems we need to also consider how to support the use of supplements for STU3?
The plan to support supplements is in for UTG release 2...but that will not happen for many months.
